About

Hi, I'm Koichi Nakayamada.Some people call me Koh. I'm a Cognitive Science student interested in Brain-Computer Interfaces and Machine Learning. Originally from Japan, I'm currently an international student at De Anza College, CA. Check out my vision. If you'd like to discuss ideas, collaborate on a project, or connect, feel free to email me at hello@koichin.com. You can also find me on Twitter and LinkedIn if you'd like to follow my work.

Education

  • September 2023 - Present: De Anza College, Carifornia, United States
  • April 2021 - March 2023: N High School, Okinawa, Japan
  • April 2020 - March 2021: Tsuda Gakuen High School, Mie, Japan
